title: Big Tech vs Red Tech and Diminishing Democracy in Digital Age - News18
content: Big Tech vs Red Tech and Diminishing Democracy in Digital Age  News18
description: much of the democratic world is at risk of being caught in the vice-like grip of big tech (from the West Coast of the United States) and red tech (from China). It is, therefore, time for democratic societies to discover and examine means to secure an open and free global technological ecosystem that serves all shades of democracy.
